content:
hey! As we discussed in the previous meeting, I went ahead and made a spreadsheet with all of the crates, and added it to the tracking issue (https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/88867). I've given edit access to Mara/Jane/Josh but I don't remember who else was at the meeting. Feel free to ping me for perms.

I've already taken the tentative categorization y'all have done in the hackmd and added it to the spreadsheet.
